short_summary: Maintenance and repair of lifting equipment
description: The Department of National Defence requires the provision of maintenance and emergency services for lifting equipment.
full_summary:
[Government Tender Announcement]
===============

### Solicitation Title

QETE Lifting Equipment and Maintenance and Repair Service

### Solicitation Number

W8486-228535/A

### Solicitation Status

[Tender Status]: Expired
[French]: Expiré

### Procurement Category

Service (SRV)

### Notice Type

Request for Proposal (RFP)
[French]: Demande de propositions

### Procurement Method

Competitive - Open Bidding
[French]: Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner

### Industry Classification

Heavy Equipment Maintenance and Repair Service
[French]: Service d'entretien et de réparation d'équipement lourd
 UNSPSC Code: 72154501

### Trade Agreements

Preferred bidder must comply with the requirements of the following free trade agreements:
 - Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
 - Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
 - Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
 - Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
 - Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
 - Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
 - Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
[French]
	- Accord de libre-échange Canada-Panama
	- Accord de libre-échange Canada-Honduras
	- Accord de libre-échange Canada-Corée
	- Accord de libre-échange canadien (ALEC)
	- Accord de libre-échange Canada-Colombie
	- Accord de libre-échange Canada-Pérou (ALECP)
	- Accord de libre-échange Canada-Chili (ALECC)

### Tender Closing Date

2023-06-06 14:00:00
[French]: 2023-06-06 14:00:00

### Contracting Entity

Department of National Defence
[French]: Défense Nationale / Gouvernement du Canada

### Contact Information

Justin Laundrie
Phone: (343) 571-8929
Email: [justin.laundrie@forces.gc.ca](mailto:justin.laundrie@forces.gc.ca)

### Tender Closing Location

National Capital Region (NCR)
[French]: Région de la capitale nationale (RCN)

### Tender Documents

Tender notice and all relevant documentation are available on the Government of Canada's Buy and Sell website at [https://buyandsell.gc.ca/](https
